data.comment: Ryan Sanusi (Beerschot) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 32, Goal! Felipe Avenatti gives Liege a 0-1 lead in Antwerp.
Nicolas Raskin with an assist there.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Olympisch Stadion.
Mohamed Halaimia is on a sub for Denis Prychynenko for Beerschot.
The away team replace Felipe Avenatti with Obbi Oulare.
In the minute 69, Philippe Montanier is making the team's second substitution at Olympisch Stadion with Abdoul Tapsoba replacing Duje Cop.
Collins Fai (Liege) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Liege make their third substitution with Merveille Bokadi replacing Eden Shamir.
In the minute 77, Goal! Liege extend their lead to 0-2 through Maxime Lestienne.
That's a fine assist from Nicolas Raskin.
Musashi Suzuki is replacing Ryan Sanusi for the home team.
In the minute 80, Yan Vorogovskiy (Beerschot) has received a yellow card from Nathan Verboomen.
Goal! Obbi Oulare extends Liege lead to 0-3 with a header.
Maxime Lestienne instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 84, Raphael Holzhauser is booked for the home team.
The match is over. Final score 0-3.
